name: linen scarf
notes:
this scarf is designed to mimic the knit linen stitch, with the perk that itâ€™s double sided and is a lot quicker to work up. it is worked lengthwise with fringe added at the end if desired. variegated yarn is recommended, but solid colors can be used to created an alternating pattern of stripes.

note: the yardage amount given is a close approximation. less or more yardage can be used to make a shorter/narrower or longer/wider scarf.

note: if it looks like there will be pooling of colors, try working every few rows or every other row with a second skein or the inside and outside of the ball.
